question: How will commissions work with the Insurers through Pennie?
text:
How will commissions work with the Insurers through Pennie?
          
        
Pennie recognizes the important and unique role that producers serve in the marketplace and is committed to ensuring customers have access to a robust network of producers to support their decision making.
2021 plan certification proposals to require insurers pay a consistent rate of producer commissions and to provide advanced notice of producer commission payment schedules.
At this time, Pennie does not have any additional requirements related to producer commissions.
